sentences.en: Although these figures are only rough estimates, they do strikingly underline the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些数字是比较粗糙的估计, 但在很大程度上表明了这些问题的严重性.

sentences.en: He must underline and make heavily explicit.
sentences.cn: 他一定要刻意雕琢,力求明白.

sentences.en: His failures underline the difference between theatre and film direction.
sentences.cn: 他的失败说明了导演戏剧和电影是不同的。

sentences.en: New details underline the sophistication of the BMW X 5� � s design.
sentences.cn: 新设计的BMWX5具有卓尔不凡的特色.

sentences.en: Now underline the words I read.
sentences.cn: 现在,在我读的词下面画线.

sentences.en: Please underline the noun clauses in the passage.
sentences.cn: 请用线画出短文中的名词性从句.

sentences.en: Read the letter and underline the new words from this unit.
sentences.cn: 阅读这封信并画出本单元的生词.

sentences.en: Read the passage and underline the topic of each paragraph.
sentences.cn: 阅读文章,找出段落大意;并明确找出英语语言多样化的原因.

sentences.en: Take two coloured pens and underline the positive and negative words.
sentences.cn: 用两支彩笔分别在表示肯定和否定意义的词下面画线。

sentences.en: Their brief visit has served to underline the deep differences between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他们短暂的访问恰恰凸显了两国间分歧的严重程度。

sentences.en: These different roles underline the importance of these cells.
sentences.cn: 这些不同的作用强调了这些细胞的重要性.

sentences.en: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.cn: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

sentences.en: Today at Cana many underline the grace of marriage and family.
sentences.cn: 今天在加纳很多人强调婚姻和家庭的恩典.

sentences.en: Underline all the sentences you do not know.
sentences.cn: 在你不懂的句子下面划一条线.

sentences.en: Underline the following that apply to you.
sentences.cn: 在符合自身情况的项下画线。

sentences.en: Use a clearly contrasting colour for links, and preferably underline them.
sentences.cn: 链接的颜色应该与网页中其它文本的颜色有个清晰的对比, 最好是使用下划线.

trans.tran_en: to show that something is important
to show that something is important
